m_szDocSumamry: Trina Solar Receives Management Buyout Offer December 15th, 2015 by Joshua S Hill   Trina Solar, one of the world’s leading solar PV manufacturers, has received a buyout offer from its chairman and chief executive. In a press release published Monday, Chinese-based Trina Solar revealed that its board of directors had received a “preliminary non-binding proposal letter” from the company’s Chairman and Chief Executive, Mr Jifan Gao, in conjunction with Shanghai Xingsheng Equity Investment & Management.
